verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, When I bring the sword <S%H2719><s%> upon a land <S%H776><s%>, if the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of their coasts <S%H7097><s%>, and set <S%H5414><s%> him for their watchman <S%H6822><s%>:
If when he sees <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, he blows <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and warns <S%H2094><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>;

Then whoever <S%H8085><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and takes not warning <S%H2094><s%>; if the sword <S%H2719><s%> comes <S%H935><s%>, and takes him away <S%H3947><s%>, his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>.

He heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and took not warning <S%H2094><s%>; his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon him <S%H2094><s%>. But he that takes warning shall deliver <S%H4422><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>.

But if the watchman <S%H6822><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, and blows <S%H8628><s%> not the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> are not warned <S%H2094><s%>; if the sword <S%H2719><s%> comes <S%H935><s%>, and takes <S%H3947><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> from among them <S%H3947><s%>, he is taken away in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> at the watchman <S%H6822><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>.

So you <S%H1121><s%>, O son of man <S%H120><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> you a watchman <S%H6822><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; therefore you shall hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and warn them from me <S%H2094><s%>.

When I say <S%H559><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H4191><s%>, you shall surely die <S%H4191><s%>; if you do not speak <S%H1696><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%>, that wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H2094><s%>, if you warn the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of his way <S%H1870><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> from it <S%H7725><s%>; if he do not turn from his way <S%H1870><s%>, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Therefore <S%H1121><s%>, O you son of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Thus you speak <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> and our sins <S%H2403><s%> are upon us <S%H4743><s%>, and we pine away in them <S%H2421><s%>, how should we then live?

Say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2416><s%>, As I live, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, I have no pleasure <S%H2654><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; but that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%> and live <S%H2421><s%>: turn <S%H7725><s%> you <S%H7725><s%>, turn you from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>; for why will you die <S%H4191><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?

Therefore <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%>, The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall not deliver <S%H5337><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his transgression <S%H6588><s%>: as for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, he shall not fall <S%H3782><s%> thereby in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he turns <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7562><s%>; neither shall the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> to live <S%H2421><s%> for his righteousness in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he sins <S%H2398><s%>.

When I shall say <S%H559><s%> to the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, that he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>; if he trust <S%H982><s%> to his own righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and commit <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, all his righteousnesses <S%H6666><s%> shall not be remembered <S%H2142><s%>; but for his iniquity <S%H5766><s%> that he has committed <S%H6213><s%>, he shall die for it <S%H4191><s%>.

Again <S%H559><s%>, when I say unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, You shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>; if he turn <S%H7725><s%> from his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>;

If the wicked <S%H7563><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> the pledge <S%H2258><s%>, give again <S%H7999><s%> that he had robbed <S%H1500><s%>, walk <S%H1980><s%> in the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, without committing <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>; he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>, he shall not die <S%H4191><s%>.

None of his sins <S%H2403><s%> that he has committed <S%H2398><s%> shall be mentioned <S%H2142><s%> unto him <S%H6213><s%>: he has done that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>; he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>.

Yet the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%>: but as for them <S%H1870><s%>, their way is not equal <S%H8505><s%>.
When the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, he shall even die thereby <S%H4191><s%>.

But if the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7564><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>, he shall live thereby <S%H2421><s%>.

Yet you say <S%H559><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%>. O you house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you every one <S%H376><s%> after his ways <S%H1870><s%>.

And it came to pass in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our captivity <S%H1546><s%>, in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H2568><s%>, in the fifth day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that one that had escaped <S%H6412><s%> out of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, The city <S%H5892><s%> is struck <S%H5221><s%>.

Now the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was upon me in the evening <S%H6153><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> he that was escaped <S%H6412><s%> came <S%H935><s%>; and had opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, until he came <S%H935><s%> to me in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> was opened <S%H6605><s%>, and I was no more mute <S%H481><s%>.
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, they that inhabit <S%H3427><s%> those wastes <S%H2723><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> speak <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%> was one <S%H259><s%>, and he inherited <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: but we are many <S%H7227><s%>; the land <S%H776><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> us for inheritance <S%H4181><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; You eat <S%H398><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> toward your idols <S%H1544><s%>, and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>: and shall you possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>?

You stand <S%H5975><s%> upon your sword <S%H2719><s%>, you work <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%>, and you defile <S%H2930><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> his neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>: and shall you possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>?

Say <S%H559><s%> you thus unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; As I live <S%H2416><s%>, surely they that are in the wastes <S%H2723><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and him that is in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the animals <S%H2416><s%> to be devoured <S%H398><s%>, and they that be in the forts <S%H4679><s%> and in the caves <S%H4631><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> of the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

For I will lay <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> most <S%H4923><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of her strength <S%H5797><s%> shall cease <S%H7673><s%>; and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8074><s%>, that none shall pass through <S%H5674><s%>.

Then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, when I have laid <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> most <S%H4923><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> because of all their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they have committed <S%H6213><s%>.

Also <S%H1121><s%>, you son of man <S%H120><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> still are talking <S%H1696><s%> against <S%H681><s%> you by the walls <S%H7023><s%> and in the doors <S%H6607><s%> of the houses <S%H1004><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> one <S%H2297><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> to his brother <S%H251><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Come <S%H935><s%>, I pray you <S%H8085><s%>, and hear what is the word <S%H1697><s%> that comes forth <S%H3318><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And they come <S%H935><s%> unto you as the people <S%H5971><s%> comes <S%H3996><s%>, and they sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you as my people <S%H5971><s%>, and they hear <S%H8085><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%>, but they will not do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H6310><s%>: for with their mouth they show <S%H6213><s%> much love <S%H5690><s%>, but their heart <S%H3820><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their covetousness <S%H1215><s%>.

And <S%H5690><s%>, behold, you are unto them as a very lovely song <S%H7892><s%> of one that has a pleasant <S%H3303><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, and can play well <S%H2895><s%> on a instrument <S%H5059><s%>: for they hear <S%H8085><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%>, but they do them not <S%H6213><s%>.
And when this comes to pass <S%H935><s%>, (Behold <S%H935><s%>, it will come,) then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that a prophet <S%H5030><s%> has been among them <S%H8432><s%>.
